name: MyStudyBuddy
0:
”Alexa, ask My Study Buddy for a tip”
”Alexa, ask My Study Buddy how to pass a class”
”Alexa, ask My Study Buddy what's going on.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my study buddy
des: This skill will give a random study tip every time it is invoked. Use this skill to learn more about studying.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
